name: Alex Dilhofff
notes: Explains concepts with real-world examples and holds structured review sessions. Projects are meaningful and exams reward consistent practice.

name: Alexandra Stefan
notes: Detailed lectures with high expectations for precision. Assignments can be time-intensive, but rubrics are clear and office hours are helpful.

name: Donna French
notes: Very organized slides and plenty of practice problems. Grading is transparent and supportive, with frequent feedback on fundamentals.

name: Shawn Gieser
notes: Project-focused approach with weekly check-ins. Fair exams that reflect homework; participation can boost understanding.

name: Nadra Guizani
notes: Step-by-step demos and straightforward quizzes. Flexible help during office hours and constructive feedback on labs.

name: janicm Tierman
notes: Fast-paced course that emphasizes deep understanding. Start assignments early; exams are challenging but align with lecture topics.

name: Miao Yin
notes: Connects theory to practical applications and provides timely feedback. Projects build skills progressively across the term.

name: Subharag Sarkar
notes: Strong focus on algorithms and problem-solving. Homework sets are demanding but prepare you well for exams.

name: William Beksi
notes: Hands-on labs with an emphasis on coding quality. Expectations are clear; staying current with readings greatly helps.

name: Bob Weems
notes: Focuses on core fundamentals and consistent style. Lectures are straightforward, and occasional extra practice is offered.
